turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a COFFEE DRINK from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks store are you referring to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 5115 Buffalo Speedway #100, Houston, TX 77005

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need it now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to pick it up as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which specific product do you want to buy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Espresso Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which size do you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Small one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want them to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to add any other flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to have extra whipped cream, if possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just Espresso Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Then it will be $4.75. Is this okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just ordered for you. It will be available for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Will I receive the receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the receipt will be sent via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You have been very helpful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It was my pleasure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Good by.
